import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from './product.service'; import { Product } from './product.model'; import { CurrencyService } from '../currency.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent implements OnInit { products: Product[] = []; selectedCurrency: string = 'USD'; currencies = [ { name: 'US Dollar', code: 'USD' }, { name: 'Euro', code: 'EUR' }, { name: 'Japanese Yen', code: 'JPY' }, // Add more currencies as needed ]; constructor(private productService: ProductService, private currencyService: CurrencyService) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadProducts(); } loadProducts() { this.productService.getProducts().subscribe(products => (this.products = products)); } onCurrencyChange(currency: string) { this.selectedCurrency = currency; this.currencyService.setCurrency(currency); } convertPrice(price: number, targetCurrency: string): number { // Implement logic for currency conversion here // This is a placeholder and should be replaced with actual conversion logic return price; } }
